price: 14. Iyo waxa dhulka ku sugan dhammaan markaas uu isagu badbaado.
arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
